explanations.reason: The paper focuses on the relationship between environmental, social, and governance (ESG) practices and corporate risk-taking (CRT) in the high-tech industry, using statistical methods like ordinary least square regression and quantile regression analysis. None of the provided keywords related to machine learning, deep learning, or other AI techniques are mentioned or implied in the title or abstract. The study is empirical and statistical in nature, not involving any machine learning or AI methodologies.
